verbs.description: [ARG0: dutch chef] [V: uses] [ARG1: 3d printers] [ARG2: to create tasty works of art] jan smink is the first to give printed food a permanent place in each course on the menu at his new restaurant art jan smink nina hoff roxana saberi restaurant smink
